title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 642.1 - Retention of records at principal office required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 642.1 - Retention of records at principal office required

State Regulations

Every corporation, company, association, joint stock
association, partnership and person under the jurisdiction of this commission
shall retain possession of all accounts, books, contracts, records, documents
and papers, and hold them for inspection by the Public Service Commission or
its agents or employees at the principal office of such corporation, company, association, joint stock association, partnership and person under the
jurisdiction of this commission until this commission has approved of the
transfer of its or their property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
642.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
